p: Such techno-fetishism is an outdated cover for a corporate regime dedicated to large-scale management of nature for purposes of covering tracks (eg, GM failures, superweeds, toxic chemicals, animal cruelty), and attempting to perfect ‘agriculture without farmers’,9 which, to put it simply, is widely recognized now as unsustainable at best and perilous to human and planetary health at worst. Under these circumstances, it is short-sighted, to say the least, for the UN leadership to validate the ‘Great Reset’, in the interests of corporate capture.
